mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMERSERVICE(cs_uid, cs_memid, cs_content, cs_subject) VALUES(CUSTOMERSERVICE_SEQ.nextval, #{cs_memid}, #{cs_content}, #{cs_subject})
mapper.select: SELECT cs_uid, cs_memid, cs_subject, cs_content, cs_status, cs_regdate FROM (SELECT cs_uid, cs_memid, cs_subject, cs_content, cs_status, cs_regdate , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cs_uid DESC) AS RNUM FROM CUSTOMERSERVICE) CS WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY cs_uid DESC
SELECT COUNT(cs_uid) FROM CUSTOMERSERVICE WHERE cs_uid > 0
SELECT cs_uid, cs_memid, cs_subject, cs_content, cs_status, cs_regdate, cs_answer FROM CUSTOMERSERVICE WHERE cs_uid = #{cs_uid}
